page.title: 14A PUPIL-GREAT HAYWOOD SCHOOL
page.content: My name is Emma Featherstone. My age is ten. I live at 48 Ridgeway, Hixon, Staffs. I have 2 sisters, one is mentally handicapped. Her name is Zoe. She is 5 years old. She goes to a special school called "Marshlands". I have another sister called Nicola, she is 12. Her school is "Blessed William Howard". My mum works at W.H.Smiths in Stafford. My dad works at "Palethorpes" and is a manager. My mum wakes me up at 7 o'clock but I always get up at 7.30. I have breakfast and wash my face, brush my teeth, brush my hair and then go to school. I have a good day. If my mum is working I go to Sue Corbans. If my mum is at home,then I go straight home. My dad has a Ford Granada motor car, my mum has a Renault.
